name: Osiris (itch)
description:
You are a pharaoh ressucted by a spell of the book of the dead.

To cross to the afterlife and complete the path of Osiris to illumination, you shall complete the ritual by finding all the missing scrolls.

Let the sound guide you towards the scrolls, and good luck!

Game Design:

  • Lucas Santos
  • Daniel Savoia
  • Fernando Emboaba

Programming:

  • Lucas Santos
  • Daniel Savoia

Music and sound effects:

  • Fernando Emboaba
